channel.title: The music makers
channel.description:
Distinguished Americans discuss their profession of music, from composition to criticism; the business of music and its current place in our national culture.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: John McClure
item.description: This program focuses on record producer and engineer John McClure.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Pat
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest
